border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Performance Guarantee

Alutech Aluminium And Glass uses testing facilities in Dubai, UAE and evaluates our building envelopes as per local and international standards based on the specifications.

We also aim to construct full-size mockups in the majority of our projects, allowing for load and performance tests to be carried out.

Through a rigorous and intensive process, we ensure a high level of performance excellence across all of our product solutions.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”30″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1627110796021{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-left: 20px !important;}”]“[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1632549583914{margin-top: -30px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”]

All of our façades are tested under the most stringent conditions to ensure their continued performance throughout the building life-cycle.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626517982510{margin-right: 20px !important;}”]

”
